alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Jefferson Davis; Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 23 at 10:25AM CST until December 24 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River Near Glenmora ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Mermentau River Near Mermentau Sabine River Near Deweyville ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier Calcasieu River near White Oak Park Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mermentau River Near Mermentau. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 4.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding near the river will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM CST Friday the stage was 4.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:15 AM CST Friday was 4.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow morning and continue falling to 3.4 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 4.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Mermentau River Mermentau 4.0 4.4 Fri 10 am CS 3.9 3.7 3.5 &&
